title: Britaines busse. Or A computation aswell of the charge of a busse or herring-fishing ship As also of the gaine and profit thereby. With the States proclamation annexed vnto the same, as concerning herring-fishing. By E.S.
author: E. S. (Edward Sharpe), 17th cent.
publisher: Printed by William Iaggard for Nicholas Bourne, and are to be sold at his shop at the south entry of the Royal Exchange,
notes: The proclamation of the Staten Generaal of the Netherlands is dated: 19. of Iuly.
With errata below "Finis". Variant: lacking errata.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
